recipes.title: Cinnamon Apple Shakes
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a blender, combine all ingredients; cover and process until smooth. Pour into chilled glasses. Serve immediately.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Cinnamon Apple Shakes in  Quick CookingSeptember/October 2004, p9                                                                                                                                                                                                         Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 cup equals 300 calories, 12 g fat (7 g saturated fat), 47 mg cholesterol, 175 mg sodium, 45 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, 5 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                    Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a blender, combine all ingredients; cover and process until smooth.
